ease finished sweater measurements there are 2 different gauges for this sweater so there are 3 different size charts the pattern is the same but the fit will vary depending on which gauge/yarn you choose to use the fingering weight version i made the fall fade colors had a very similar gauge to the single strand of mohair so i did not add those calculations to simplify things gauge 17 stitches single strand of mohair version with short sleeves pink and the double strand of suri with long sleeves white if you lengthen the body or sleeves you may need more yarn than what is listed short
